doc.title: Imperial Orgies
doc.plot: The story of the "House Rabbi" at a posh air-raid shelter in the basement of a Jewish bordello in wartime London. The perfervid, peos-grabbing holy man is unaware of the holocaust raging on the Continent, and immerses himself in luxury and lubricity until a marginal and syphilitic encounter with a single hummingbird changes his life forever.
